    Stretched and Droned

    Fooled around audio material "freely" available on the Internet.

    This demo works and has been tested in Chrome, but won't work in Firefox because cross-origin audio is forbidden. So probably it will stop working in versions of Chrome :'(

    Demo built with Web Audio API, and paulstretch.js
